code:
// CONSTS
export var SET_LANG='SET_LANG';export var SET_AUTH_USER='SET_AUTH_USER';export var SET_MAXIMIZE='SET_MAXIMIZE';export var SET_TOKEN='SET_TOKEN';export var SET_REGIONS='SET_REGIONS';export var SET_REGION='SET_REGION';// MODAL CONSTS
export var MODAL_TOGGLE='MODAL_TOGGLE';export var MODAL_TITLE='MODAL_TITLE';// MODAL IMPORT CONSTS
export var MODAL_IMPORT_TOGGLE='MODAL_IMPORT_TOGGLE';// SPINNER CONSTS
export var SPINNER_TOGGLE='SPINNER_TOGGLE';// MODAL Export CONSTS
export var MODAL_EXPORT_TOGGLE='MODAL_EXPORT_TOGGLE';//EXCEL TO JSON CONSTS
export var HANDLE_FILE='HANDLE_FILE';// TOPOLOGY CONSTS
export var SET_TOPOLOGY_FIRST_LEVEL='SET_TOPOLOGY_FIRST_LEVEL';export var SET_TOPOLOGY_SECOND_LEVEL='SET_TOPOLOGY_SECOND_LEVEL';export var SET_TOPOLOGY_SECOND_LEVEL_DROPDOWN_LABELS='SET_TOPOLOGY_SECOND_LEVEL_DROPDOWN_LABELS';// EDIT ON HANDSONTABLE
export var EDIT_ON_TOGGLE="EDIT_ON_TOGGLE";// Language settings
export var setLang=function setLang(langFile,lang){return{type:SET_LANG,payload:{langFile:langFile,lang:lang}};};// Save the authenticated user data into redux
export var setAuthUser=function setAuthUser(user){return{type:SET_AUTH_USER,user:user};};// Save provided web token from server
export var setToken=function setToken(token){return{type:SET_TOKEN,token:token};};// set user regions into redux
export var setRegions=function setRegions(regions){return{type:SET_REGIONS,regions:regions};};// set selected region from selection component
export var setSelectedRegion=function setSelectedRegion(region){return{type:SET_REGION,region:region};};// Maximizing setting for content and toolbar
export var setMaximize=function setMaximize(){return{type:SET_MAXIMIZE};};// Show second level topology diagram in modal window for ran
// modalToggle first state is false, modal will show if this value change to true.
export var modalToggle=function modalToggle(){return{type:MODAL_TOGGLE};};// Set the modal window title
export var modalTitle=function modalTitle(title){return{type:MODAL_TITLE,title:title};};//Modal IMport toggle
export var modalImportToggle=function modalImportToggle(){return{type:MODAL_IMPORT_TOGGLE};};//Modal Export toggle
export var modalExportToggle=function modalExportToggle(){return{type:MODAL_EXPORT_TOGGLE};};//Spinner toggle
export var spinnerToggle=function spinnerToggle(){return{type:SPINNER_TOGGLE};};//Excel to JSON handler
export var handleFile=function handleFile(){return{type:HANDLE_FILE};};// Topology diagram default state graph data
export var setTopologyFirstLevel=function setTopologyFirstLevel(data){return{type:SET_TOPOLOGY_FIRST_LEVEL,payload:{data:data}};};// Topology diagram second state graph data. This is only need for ran topology
export var setTopologySecondLevel=function setTopologySecondLevel(data){return{type:SET_TOPOLOGY_SECOND_LEVEL,payload:{data:data}};};// Topology diagram second level dropdown labels, this is only need for ran topology second level
export var setTopologySecondLevelDropdownLabels=function setTopologySecondLevelDropdownLabels(data){return{type:SET_TOPOLOGY_SECOND_LEVEL_DROPDOWN_LABELS,payload:{data:data}};};// Edit mode flag on handsontable
export var editOnToggle=function editOnToggle(){return{type:EDIT_ON_TOGGLE};};
